headline: Is International Flavors & Fragrances (IFF) Attractively Priced After Recent Share Price Rebound?
summary: If you are looking at International Flavors & Fragrances and wondering whether the current share price reflects its true worth, you are not alone. The stock last closed at US$72.16, with returns of 1.9% over the past week and 8.7% over the past month, while the 1 year return sits at a 14.6% decline and the 3 and 5 year returns are 29.2% and 28.3% declines respectively. Recent coverage has focused on how investors are reassessing companies in the materials and ingredients space, with...
